vote.title: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 15 to increase the service contract, with two one-year renewal options with Workday, Inc. for continued licensing, configuration, hosting, maintenance, and technical support for the City’s existing human resource and payroll system for the Department of Information and Technology Services; and (2) to extend the contract from March 3, 2025 to March 2, 2026 - Not to exceed $4,353,943.00, from $24,922,512.26 to $29,276,455.26 - Financing:  Data Services Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 15 to increase the service contract, with two one-year renewal options with Workday, Inc. for continued licensing, configuration, hosting, maintenance, and technical support for the City’s existing human resource and payroll system for the Department of Information and Technology Services; and (2) to extend the contract from March 3, 2025 to March 2, 2026 - Not to exceed $4,353,943.00, from $24,922,512.26 to $29,276,455.26 - Financing:  Data Services Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
